name: Fishton: A Town to Remember
description:
Choose to follow the story line or play your own way.
Fishton is a charming little town with a sad twist. With a rich story line and many options on how to live your life.
You've arrived in town to meet your uncle Fish but you will stay for the countless attractions the town has to offer.

In Fishton you will learn the value of a hard earned dollar and the benefits of keeping your town clean by recycling unused parts.
Collect scrap and recycle, collect old parts and fix them up to build a new vehicle.

Learn the basics of auto mechanics to improve your vehicle and in turn your life.

Work in town, recycle to get that precious scrap money, fix up and sell used cars, race your newly fixed car, buy and flip houses, or don't and live on the streets and eat old meat you find. your decide in Fishton: A Town to remember.

  • Variety of vehicles to customize.
  • One of a kind race track.
  • Variety of jobs to choose from.
  • Many houses to buy or rent
  • Unique survival system
  • One of kind economy.
  • Ability to build and use your own computer in game?
  • Decorate your house.
  • Detail your vehicle.
  • Fuel system.
  • Unique story line.
  • Many loot spawns to unlock.
  • Recycle.
